title: Logistics Program Manager
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, we believe new insights have a way of becoming excellent products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish...
description: We are looking for someone who can develop or execute project plan to support volume surge and NPI launches and ensuring suppliers compliance to Apple HSR/FSR -  Maintain metrics and analyze data to assess supplier’s key performance indices and implement operational improvements. Work towards operational quality across the supply-chain in achieving timely shipment execution...
key_qualifications: 8+ years of logistics experience and with sound knowledge of customs regulations, international air, ocean and road inbound and outbound freight. Preference would include a wider knowledge on the different types of freight management i.e. bulk, parcel, rail, ocean, domestic & cross-border transportation and DC/Hub operation would be an added advantage...
education_experience: Bachelors / Masters degree from a reputed school. Strong Operations Research, Industrial Engineering background, EDI connectivity project experience is preferred.
